column2:
NOTES 
The Soldier's car : 
   - Takes lots of detours
column3:
- Came here 6 month ago 
   - From Sicily 
   - Is one of Lanza's guard 
   - Lanza reinforce his protection
column4:
- He is afraid that we could be tailed 
   - The trial left the mob on it gards 
   - Where is the strawman of <color=red>Lima</color> ? 
   - Something goes wrong with the trial 
   - <color=red>Giovanni</color> the strawman is dead 
Don't feel like it will be easy
column5:
Giovanni's apartment : 
   - Not one but two bodies 
   - The second Body was a prostitute 
   - He thinks that they couldn't kill each other
column6: - <color=red>Giovanni</color> was made capo some months ago \n   - His family is under the mob protection \n
column7:
- <color=red>Giovanni</color> was not really good in his job 
   - He has no family except his mother 
   - The mother lives in Sicily 
   - He came to America alone
column8: - Not sure if the second body realy was a prostitute \n   - <color=red>Giovanni</color> was a gentleman then no reasons for her to murder him \n
column9: - No one has ever seen them together before \n
column10: - The killer shot <color=red>Giovanni</color> right in the forehead \n   What is this <u>poker chip</u> ? \n
column11:
- The second body really seems to be a prostitute 
   - They were not killed in the same way 
   - The prostitute throat was cut off 
   - There is a <u>key</u> in her bag 
   - The key is for a hotelroom
column12:
- The bedroom was not often used 
   - This room is tidy and the bed is made 
   - Too few clothes for someone like <color=red>Giovanni</color> 
There is already something wrong.
column13:
The Motel : 
   - The girl lived in a shady hotel at The Wharf Inn 2601 Mason Street 
   - She lived in the room 237
column14: - It seems the motel manager doesn't want to challenge the police \n
column15:
The prostitute apartment : 
   - She smoked 
   - Her stuff proves that she was a prostitute 
   - She corresponded with her sister 
   - Her first name was <color=red>Margaret</color> 
She is my only lead.
column16:
The Condor Club : 
   - It looks like a simple Club 
   - There are not many people here
column17:
The Sheraton Hotel : 
   - This hotel seems to be empty 
   -     He claims he haven't left the room since Cara left 
   - The Driver comes in the room with a gun 
   - Cara didn't seem to want to go with him 
   - He is tall and has a normal corpulence 
   - Eyes : Green
column19:
Lombard Condominiums : 
   - I didn't picture a professionnal killer living in a place like that 
   - There are not many people there
   - A man came for the driver 
   - The stranger threatened the Driver with a gun 
   - He sounded like Russian or Slavic
   - he is tattooed 
   - I think that I will call this young Lady an other day 
   - They took Cooper's car : an old grey pick-up truck
column21: \nThe Fake Driver Car is a <u>Chebrillet Deluxe</u>  \n
column23:
Pier 32 : 
   - I heard a shot gun 
   - After that shot gun a car ran away 
   - License Plate : 456 489
column24:
- They know who I am but didn't want to help me 
   -  Am I to mush drunk ? 
   - They are hiding somethings in that Club 
   - That vodka was good 
   - I have to prove that the girl worked here
column26: - No tip for <color=red>Dean</color> \n   - I couldn't come back until I found something else \n
column27: - She know that I work for <color=red>Abati</color>. Really strange for a simple Club Manager \n   - No tip for <color=red>Dean</color> ! \n
column29: - Margaret seems not to be a prostitute name \n
column30:
- I was right the club is really a brothel 
   - They havn't seen <color=red>Cara</color> since two days 
   - Disappointing they don't know about the murder
column31: - The last time that she saw <color=red>Cara</color> a Condor Club's driver brought her to a client's place but he never returns \n
column32:
- The last client is a regular and has a crush on her 
   - He already asked Cara to quit her job for him 
   Client's hotel : <u>Sheraton</u> 
   - He has already done strange things when he couldn't see her
column33: \nAbati's restaurant : <u>The Little Door Restaurant 2235 Beach Avet</u> \n
column35: - She didn't know about a relationship between <color=red>Giovanni</color> and <color=red>Margaret</color> \n   - She didn't see them together before \n
column36: Giovanni had a <u>love letter</u> in his bedroom \n
column37:
- <color=red>Morello</color> was here 
   - He pretended that he want to have a drink with me 
   - Did the mob ask him to keep an eye on me ? 
   - It was him that advised for the strong method 
   - <color=red>Giovanni</color> and him had a buisiness together : <u>Castelbueno Oil Company</u> 
I have a Morello Company's <u>visit card</u>
column38: \n   - Where is this <u>car</u> now ? Maybe in a wreck yard or a parking lot

column3:
<color=red>Anthony Lima</color> : 
The former God Father of the San Francisco's Italian mob. He is actually charged with grand theft
column4:
<color=red>James Lanza</color> : 
Or Jimmy the Hat. The actual Under Boss of San francisco's Italian mob.
column5:
<color=red>Tommy Giovanni</color> : 
A Capo of the Italian Mob and the Strawman of Lima. He is now dead.
column6:
<color=red>Motel Manager</color> : 
The Motel Manager of the prostitute appartment.
column7:
<color=red>Margaret O'bannon</color> : 
The prostitute that was found dead with Giovanni in his appartment.
column8:
<color=red>The Madam</color> : 
The owner and Madam of the Condor Club.
column9: <color=red>Restaurant Manager</color> : Manager of the Dinner and a head of the Russian mob. \n \n
column10: <color=red>Salvatore Morelo</color> : The Consigliere of the Italian Mob. \n \n
column11: <color=red>Michael Abati</color> : Lima's substitute and the actual God Father of the Italian Mob.
column12: <color=red>Cooper</color> : He Drive the Condor Club's Prostitutes to the client's place.
column13: <color=red>Valery Chtcherbina</color> : The Killer and Fake Driver that I found dead on The Pier.
